__e: Fanny, I've been meaning to ask you, how long are you staying?
For I am prodigious fond of Fanny.
I'll handle this myself. Fanny, dear, I called to tell you that I won't be home for supper tonight. I have a very important business engagement across town.
I just hope Miss Fanny and Jo Ellen will be all right.
But it's only old Fanny, so whatever she says, pick on her for it.
The truth is, Fanny, and this must be our secret, you must never tell anyone.
